summary: Jack\'s Troll Skull  [A revised version of a troll\'s skull.]
descriptionHtml:
[center] 
[IMG]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/32663-1-1362237549.png[/IMG] 

[color=red][b]Updated to 1.03[/b][/color]

(improved UV mapping)

[color=red][b]Updated to 1.02[/b][/color]

(completely rebuilt, looks slightly better under nearly every kind of lighting and is more realistic)
 
[color=red][b]Updated to 1.01[/b][/color]

(less shiny-ish due to added specular map)


[color=yellow][size=5]What this thing is all about ?[/size][/color]

[b]Simply put I couldn\'t withstand anymore the ugliest troll\'s skulls ever seen and I made this retexture just for myself but I can assume that since tastes are tastes maybe someone else could appreciate it either. This mod contains only a mesh and 1024x1024 textures for troll\'s skulls, with an improved normal map and the update 1.01 introduced a specular map too, nothing more, nothing less, the whole thing looks great using lighting overhauls that darkens the locations in which these things are found (or shows up, as you prefer). I find it could add that bit of immersion that\'s never too much.[/b]

[size=3] If you shouldn\'t like this mod it\'s very easy to uninstall through NMM or following instructions included in the inner Jacks_Troll_Skull_Readme.txt (copied in the \"Skyrim->Data\" folder) or posted here on the nexus in the apprpriate section, if you should like it instead an endorsement would be greatly appreciated, being my first (public) mod AND a very simple one I don\'t expect too much but ... you know.. [/size] 

[color=red][size=4]Notes:[/size][/color]

Pictures are very welcome but please don\'t get angry if I like to choose myself the most weird, funny or good looking one :)

[color=red][size=4]Compatibility:[/size][/color]

Everything that doesn\'t overwrite the mesh or the texture of a troll\'s skull. 

[color=red][size=4]Relyability:[/size][/color]

It\'s proven it will work until you decide to get rid of it. 

[color=red][size=4]Work In Progress:[/size][/color]

Something fluo ?

...and a new rework of another simple item, can\'t say anything more for now...


[/center]
author: JackLaVaporiera
